key_phrases: the more the City publicizes, the better the City reaches to the people who could utilize the funding
multiple grant application workshops at cultural centers like AARC or at ACC & UT
A Music Week to showcase the artists that the City supported through the grants & the grant itself
Art workshops to go around AISD schools to promote the grant and encourage students to pursue art
barriers_identified: lack of awareness of funding opportunities
limited engagement with youth and students
solutions_proposed: host multiple grant application workshops at cultural centers and educational institutions
organize a Music Week to showcase grant-supported artists
conduct art workshops in AISD schools to promote grants and encourage student participation
